analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x68f0c43b5493e08e6cf8deef6e9e36f3d3ef988a.sol:
	Contract TouristToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x68f0c43b5493e08e6cf8deef6e9e36f3d3ef988a.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x68f0c43b5493e08e6cf8deef6e9e36f3d3ef988a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
